blogPost.excerpt: Staff Design is a collection of interviews exploring how product designers navigate the individual contributor path to its highest levels.
blogPost.body: Staff Design is a collection of interviews exploring how product designers navigate the individual contributor path to its highest levels.
blogPost.title: Staff Design - Navigating the individual contributor career path
blogPost.author: Brian Lovin

localize.description: 员工设计》是一个访谈集，探讨产品设计师如何在个人贡献者的道路上探索出最高境界。
localize.tagline: 为个人缴费者的职业道路导航

localize.description: 員工設計》是一個訪談集，探討產品設計師如何在個人貢獻者的道路上探索出最高境界。
localize.tagline: 爲個人繳費者的職業道路導航

previous.excerpt: Everything you need for your Webflow workflow, neatly organized in Notion. Color palettes, fonts, courses, inspiration & more.
previous.title: Super Mega Pack - Everything Webflow, neatly organized inside of Notion.

localize.description: 一切你需要的Webflow工作流程，整齐地组织在Notion中。调色板、字体、课程、灵感等。
localize.tagline: 一切的Webflow，都整齐地组织在Notion里面。

localize.description: 一切你需要的Webflow工作流程，整齊地組織在Notion中。調色板、字體、課程、靈感等。

next.excerpt: A crazy online island to get lost in, solve puzzles together and stop a rogue A.I. from uploading his malicious code onto the web. Created by Amsterdam based escape room designers Sherlocked and the team behind the new spacial video chat platform Mibo.
next.title: Escape from Mibo Island - An amazing 3D spacial video escape room game

localize.description: 一个疯狂的在线岛屿，让你迷失在其中，一起解开谜题，阻止一个无赖的人工智能将他的恶意代码上传到网上。由阿姆斯特丹的逃生室设计师Sherlocked和新的空间视频聊天平台Mibo背后的团队创建。
localize.tagline: 一个惊人的3D空间视频逃生室游戏。

localize.description: 一個瘋狂的在線島嶼，讓你迷失在其中，一起解開謎題，阻止一個無賴的人工智能將他的惡意代碼上傳到網上。由阿姆斯特丹的逃生室設計師Sherlocked和新的空間視頻聊天平臺Mibo背後的團隊創建。
localize.tagline: 一個驚人的3D空間視頻逃生室遊戲。
